amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being available for the Belmont Complex in Armstrong County, Pennsylvania.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $300,000 appropriation in the bill for the Belmont Complex in Armstrong County, Pennsylvania.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 335 (Roll no. 698).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
